org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas

类 FileArchiverNotifierImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas.FileArchiverNotifierImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FileArchiverNotifier

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class FileArchiverNotifierImpl
extends Object
implements FileArchiverNotifier
    Tracks file archiving and updates the hbase quota table.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  FileArchiverNotifierImpl.QuotaSnapshotSizeSerializationException
      An Exception thrown when SnapshotSize updates to hbase:quota fail to be written.
      (专用程序包) static class  FileArchiverNotifierImpl.SnapshotWithSize
      A struct encapsulating the name of a snapshot and its "size" on the filesystem.
      (专用程序包) static class  FileArchiverNotifierImpl.StoreFileReference
      A reference to a collection of files in the archive directory for a single region.

    • 字段概要

      Records a file and its size in bytes being moved to the archive directory.

      For the given snapshot, find all files which this snapshotName references.
      long computeAndStoreSnapshotSizes(Collection<String> currentSnapshots)
      Computes the size of a table and all of its snapshots, recording new "full" sizes for each.
      (专用程序包) List<FileArchiverNotifierImpl.SnapshotWithSize> computeSnapshotSizes(List<String> snapshots)
      Computes the size of each snapshot against the table referenced by this.
      (专用程序包) long getLastFullCompute()
      Returns a strictly-increasing measure of time extracted by System.nanoTime().
      (专用程序包) static Object getLockForNamespace(String namespace) 
      (专用程序包) long getPreviousNamespaceSnapshotSize(Table quotaTable, String namespace)
      Fetches the current size of all snapshots in the given namespace.
      (专用程序包) long getSizeOfStoreFile(TableName tn, FileArchiverNotifierImpl.StoreFileReference storeFileName)
      Computes the size of the store files for a single region.
      (专用程序包) long getSizeOfStoreFile(TableName tn, String regionName, String family, String storeFile)
      Computes the size of the store file given its name, region and family name in the archive directory.
      (专用程序包) long getSizeOfStoreFiles(TableName tn, Set<FileArchiverNotifierImpl.StoreFileReference> storeFileNames)
      Computes the size of each store file in storeFileNames
      (专用程序包) long getSnapshotSizeFromResult(Result r)
      Extracts the size component from a serialized SpaceQuotaSnapshot protobuf.
      (专用程序包) Set<FileArchiverNotifierImpl.StoreFileReference> getStoreFilesFromSnapshot(SnapshotManifest manifest, Predicate<String> filter)
      Extracts the names of the store files referenced by this snapshot which satisfy the given predicate (the predicate returns true).
      (专用程序包) void groupArchivedFiledBySnapshotAndRecordSize(List<String> snapshots, Set<Map.Entry<String,Long>> fileSizes)
      For each file in the map, this updates the first snapshot (lexicographic snapshot name) that references this file.
      (专用程序包) void persistSnapshotSizeChanges(Map<String,Long> snapshotSizeChanges)
      Reads the current size for each snapshot to update, generates a new update based on that value, and then writes the new update.
      (专用程序包) void persistSnapshotSizes(Table table, List<FileArchiverNotifierImpl.SnapshotWithSize> snapshotSizes)
      Writes the snapshot sizes to the provided table.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getLockForNamespace

        static Object getLockForNamespace(String namespace)

      • getLastFullCompute

        long getLastFullCompute()
        Returns a strictly-increasing measure of time extracted by System.nanoTime().

      • addArchivedFiles

        public void addArchivedFiles(Set<Map.Entry<String,Long>> fileSizes)
                      throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: FileArchiverNotifier
        Records a file and its size in bytes being moved to the archive directory.
        指定者:
        addArchivedFiles 在接口中 FileArchiverNotifier
        参数:
        fileSizes - A collection of file name to size in bytes
        抛出:
        IOException - If there was an IO-related error persisting the file size(s)

      • groupArchivedFiledBySnapshotAndRecordSize

        void groupArchivedFiledBySnapshotAndRecordSize(List<String> snapshots,
                                               Set<Map.Entry<String,Long>> fileSizes)
                                        throws IOException
        For each file in the map, this updates the first snapshot (lexicographic snapshot name) that references this file. The result of this computation is serialized to the quota table.
        参数:
        snapshots - A collection of HBase snapshots to group the files into
        fileSizes - A map of file names to their sizes
        抛出:
        IOException

      • bucketFilesToSnapshot

        void bucketFilesToSnapshot(String snapshotName,
                           Map<String,Long> filesToUpdate,
                           Map<String,Long> snapshotSizeChanges)
                    throws IOException
        For the given snapshot, find all files which this snapshotName references. After a file is found to be referenced by the snapshot, it is removed from filesToUpdate and snapshotSizeChanges is updated in concert.
        参数:
        snapshotName - The snapshot to check
        filesToUpdate - A mapping of archived files to their size
        snapshotSizeChanges - A mapping of snapshots and their change in size
        抛出:
        IOException

      • persistSnapshotSizeChanges

        void persistSnapshotSizeChanges(Map<String,Long> snapshotSizeChanges)
                         throws IOException
        Reads the current size for each snapshot to update, generates a new update based on that value, and then writes the new update.
        参数:
        snapshotSizeChanges - A map of snapshot name to size change
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getPreviousNamespaceSnapshotSize

        long getPreviousNamespaceSnapshotSize(Table quotaTable,
                                      String namespace)
                               throws IOException
        Fetches the current size of all snapshots in the given namespace.
        参数:
        quotaTable - The HBase quota table
        namespace - Namespace to fetch the sum of snapshot sizes for
        返回:
        The size of all snapshot sizes for the namespace in bytes.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getSnapshotSizeFromResult

        long getSnapshotSizeFromResult(Result r)
                        throws org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.InvalidProtocolBufferException
        Extracts the size component from a serialized SpaceQuotaSnapshot protobuf.
        参数:
        r - A Result containing one cell with a SpaceQuotaSnapshot protobuf
        返回:
        The size in bytes of the snapshot.
        抛出:
        org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.InvalidProtocolBufferException

      • computeAndStoreSnapshotSizes

        public long computeAndStoreSnapshotSizes(Collection<String> currentSnapshots)
                                  throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: FileArchiverNotifier
        Computes the size of a table and all of its snapshots, recording new "full" sizes for each.
        指定者:
        computeAndStoreSnapshotSizes 在接口中 FileArchiverNotifier
        参数:
        currentSnapshots - the current list of snapshots against this table
        返回:
        The total size of all snapshots against this table.
        抛出:
        IOException - If there was an IO-related error computing or persisting the sizes.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 Object

      • computeSnapshotSizes

        List<FileArchiverNotifierImpl.SnapshotWithSize> computeSnapshotSizes(List<String> snapshots)
                                                              throws IOException
        Computes the size of each snapshot against the table referenced by this.
        参数:
        snapshots - A sorted list of snapshots against tn.
        返回:
        A list of the size for each snapshot against tn.
        抛出:
        IOException

                         Set<FileArchiverNotifierImpl.StoreFileReference> storeFileNames)
        Computes the size of each store file in storeFileNames

                        String family,
                        String storeFile)

        Set<FileArchiverNotifierImpl.StoreFileReference> getStoreFilesFromSnapshot(SnapshotManifest manifest,
                                                                           Predicate<String> filter)
        Extracts the names of the store files referenced by this snapshot which satisfy the given predicate (the predicate returns true).
